short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GrowLead scrape and extract public emails from Instagram and grow your lead.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GrowLead, it's a scraping tool for business leads, one click to extract public email addresses from Instagram and export to csv file.

üöÄ Features
‚úì Scrape followers and following for any user from Instagram
‚úì Extract based on hashtags, locations, comments, likes or custom users.
‚úì Extract profile data such as Emails, biography, follower count, following count, phone number, address, and more!
‚úì Export data to CSV and Excel xlsx

# How to get started?
1. Select Extract Type
2. Enter the corresponding Username, Hashtag, Location Id, Post Link, or Custom users
3. Click EXTRACT Button

üõ°Ô∏è Data Privacy
Security is our top priority! GrowLead never asks for your IG password and ensures all processed data remains on your local computer, never passing through our servers.

# Statement
There is a risk that your account may be deactivated or blocked by IG when using the extension and you should control the frequency of use at your own risk.

# FAQ
If you have any questions, feel free to contact support@convlead.com

üí∞ About Pro
It's a paid extension, you can export the first free quota emails for free trial.
